content: > ✨ **margrete pattern updated ** ✨ > > this pattern has been remastered with > clearer instructions improved rounds > and a better layout > > to celebrate enjoy **50% off** any > pattern in my store with code > **margrete50** valid until march 3rd > **please check my other designs here 1 ** **details** the pattern consists of 19 rounds crochet skill level is advanced you will need to work front and back post stitches clusters two stitches together and popcorns all abbreviations special stitches and techniques are explained in detail your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches using recommended thread and hook this pattern will use minimum 220 yards of thread and your finished doily will be about 10 in diameter from point to point **languages** download includes pdf files in english and dutch languages *dutch language translation is kindly provided by anneke de wilde 2 * **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by nelly klos on facebook 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/nelly-klos-ravelry-store/patterns 2 https //www facebook com/anneke dewilde 5 3 https //www facebook com/groups/nk crochet designs/
